message: In fact, you SHOULD call Dispose in your destructor, just in case the person who instantiated you fails to call your Dispose method properly. But as Stephen said, you must take care not to throw any exceptions in your destructor, as they will not be catchable by your application, and therefore will kill your application. Please see here: [http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/vstudio/b1yfkh5e(v=vs.100).aspx](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/vstudio/b1yfkh5e(v=vs.100).aspx)
